name: Ozzy Media Inc.
description: Operator of a targeted advertisement platform created to deliver outdoor marketing content. The company's platform installs proprietary displays atop ride-hailing vehicles and offers an out-of-home content marketing network that features outdoor advertising metrics and flexible targeting, enabling clients to deliver successful marketing and advertising strategies and measure where and when their campaign will have a greater impact throughout the city.
